Name: AllLanguages
Title: All Languages
Description: This value set includes all possible codes from BCP-47 (see http://tools.ietf.org/html/bcp47)

Name: AllergyIntoleranceCategory
Title: Allergy Intolerance Category
Description: Category of an identified substance associated with allergies or intolerances.

Name: AllergyIntoleranceCriticality
Title: Allergy Intolerance Criticality
Description: Estimate of the potential clinical harm, or seriousness, of a reaction to an identified substance.

Name: AllergyIntoleranceType
Title: Allergy Intolerance Type
Description: Identification of the underlying physiological mechanism for a Reaction Risk.

Name: AllergyIntoleranceVerificationStatus
Title: AllergyIntolerance Verification Status
Description: The verification status to support or decline the clinical status of the allergy or intolerance.

Name: SNOMEDCTBodyStructures
Title: SNOMED CT Body Structures
Description: This value set includes all codes from [SNOMED CT](http://snomed.info/sct) where concept is-a 442083009 (Anatomical or acquired body site (body structure)).

Name: SNOMEDCTClinicalFindings
Title: SNOMED CT Clinical Findings
Description: This value set includes all the "Clinical finding" [SNOMED CT](http://snomed.info/sct) codes - concepts where concept is-a 404684003 (Clinical finding (finding)).

Name: ConditionCategoryCodes
Title: Condition Category Codes
Description: Preferred value set for Condition Categories.

Name: ConditionClinicalStatusCodes
Title: Condition Clinical Status Codes
Description: Preferred value set for Condition Clinical Status.

Name: ConditionDiagnosisSeverity
Title: Condition/Diagnosis Severity
Description: Preferred value set for Condition/Diagnosis severity grading.

Name: ConditionStage
Title: Condition Stage
Description: Value set for stages of cancer and other conditions.

Name: ConditionStageType
Title: Condition Stage Type
Description: Example value set for the type of stages of cancer and other conditions

Name: ConditionVerificationStatus
Title: Condition Verification Status
Description: The verification status to support or decline the clinical status of the condition or diagnosis.

Name: CommonLanguages
Title: Common Languages
Description: This value set includes common codes from BCP-47 (see http://tools.ietf.org/html/bcp47)

Name: ParticipationRoleType
Title: Participation Role Type
Description: This FHIR value set is comprised of Actor participation Type codes, which can be used to value FHIR agents, actors, and other role elements. The codes are intended to express how the agent participated in some activity. Sometimes refered to the agent functional-role relative to the activity.

Name: AllergyIntoleranceSeverity
Title: Allergy Intolerance Severity
Description: Clinical assessment of the severity of a reaction event as a whole, potentially considering multiple different manifestations.

Name: SNOMEDCTRouteCodes
Title: SNOMED CT Route Codes
Description: This value set includes all Route codes from SNOMED CT - provided as an exemplar.

Name: SubstanceCode
Title: Substance Code
Description: This value set contains concept codes for specific substances. It includes codes from [SNOMED](http://snomed.info/sct) where concept is-a 105590001 (Substance (substance))
